verses.verse: Then SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and all the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%>, the chief <S%H5387><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, unto king <S%H4428><s%> SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, that they might bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, which is TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>.

And all the men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8735><s%> themselves unto king <S%H4428><s%> SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> at the feast <S%H2282><s%> in the month <S%H3391><s%> Ethanim <S%H388><s%>, which is the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>.
And all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> took up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%>.

And they brought up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and all the holy <S%H6944><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> that were in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>, even those did the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> and the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

And king <S%H4428><s%> SHlomo <S%H8010><s%>, and all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, that were assembled <S%H3259><s%> <S%H8737><s%> unto him, were with him before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%>, sacrificing <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8764><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%> and oxen <S%H1241><s%>, that could not be told <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8735><s%> nor numbered <S%H4487><s%> <S%H8735><s%> for multitude <S%H7230><s%>.

And the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> brought in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> unto his place <S%H4725><s%>, into the oracle <S%H1687><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, to the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place, even under the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the cherubims <S%H3742><s%>.

For the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> spread forth <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8802><s%> their two wings <S%H3671><s%> over the place <S%H4725><s%> of the ark <S%H727><s%>, and the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> covered <S%H5526><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> and the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof above <S%H4605><s%>.

And they drew out <S%H748><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%>, that the ends <S%H7218><s%> of the staves <S%H905><s%> were seen out <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place before <S%H6440><s%> the oracle <S%H1687><s%>, and they were not seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8735><s%> without <S%H2351><s%>: and there they are unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

There was nothing in the ark <S%H727><s%> save <S%H7535><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%>, which Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8689><s%> there at Horev <S%H2722><s%>, when the YY <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a covenant with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, when they came out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And it came to pass, when the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> were come out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, that the cloud <S%H6051><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>,

So that the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8763><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%>: for the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> had filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
Then spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> SHlomo <S%H8010><s%>, The YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that he would dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in the thick darkness <S%H6205><s%>.

I have surely <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8800><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee an house <S%H1004><s%> to dwell in <S%H2073><s%>, a settled place <S%H4349><s%> for thee to abide in <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> turned <S%H5437><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> about <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> all the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: (and all the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%>;)

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, which spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> with his mouth <S%H6310><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, and hath with his hand <S%H3027><s%> fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Since the day <S%H3117><s%> that I brought forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, I chose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8804><s%> no city <S%H5892><s%> out of all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8800><s%> an house <S%H1004><s%>, that my name <S%H8034><s%> might be therein; but I chose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> to be over my people <S%H5971><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And it was in the heart <S%H3824><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8800><s%> an house <S%H1004><s%> for the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, Whereas <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> it was in thine heart <S%H3824><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8800><s%> an house <S%H1004><s%> unto my name <S%H8034><s%>, thou didst well <S%H2895><s%> <S%H8689><s%> that it was in thine heart <S%H3824><s%>.

Nevertheless <S%H7535><s%> thou shalt not build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%>; but thy son <S%H1121><s%> that shall come forth out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of thy loins <S%H2504><s%>, he shall build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> unto my name <S%H8034><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath performed <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his word <S%H1697><s%> that he spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, and I am risen up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the room of David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, and sit <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on the throne <S%H3678><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, as the YY <S%H3068><s%> promised <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, and have built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an house <S%H1004><s%> for the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And I have set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there a place <S%H4725><s%> for the ark <S%H727><s%>, wherein is the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, which he made <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with our fathers <S%H1><s%>, when he brought them out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8687><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> in the presence of <S%H5048><s%> all the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and spread forth <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his hands <S%H3709><s%> toward heaven <S%H8064><s%>:

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, there is no 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> like thee, in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above <S%H4605><s%>, or on earth <S%H776><s%> beneath, who keepest <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and mercy <S%H2617><s%> with thy servants <S%H5650><s%> that walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee with all their heart <S%H3820><s%>:

Who hast kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with thy servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> that thou promisedst <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> him: thou spakest <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> also with thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and hast fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it with thine hand <S%H3027><s%>, as it is this day <S%H3117><s%>.

Therefore now, YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8798><s%> with thy servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> that thou promisedst <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> him, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, There shall not fail <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8735><s%> thee a man <S%H376><s%> in my sight <S%H6440><s%> to sit <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> on the throne <S%H3678><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; so <S%H7535><s%> that thy children <S%H1121><s%> take heed <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to their way <S%H1870><s%>, that they walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me as thou hast walked <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me.

And now, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, let thy word <S%H1697><s%>, I pray thee, be verified <S%H539><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, which thou spakest <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto thy servant <S%H5650><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>.

But will 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> indeed <S%H552><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%>? behold, the heaven <S%H8064><s%> and heaven <S%H8064><s%> of heavens <S%H8064><s%> cannot contain <S%H3557><s%> <S%H8770><s%> thee; how much less <S%H637><s%> this house <S%H1004><s%> that I have builded <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ?

Yet have thou respect <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, and to his supplication <S%H8467><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%> my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, to hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto the cry <S%H7440><s%> and to the prayer <S%H8605><s%>, which thy servant <S%H5650><s%> prayeth <S%H6419><s%> <S%H8693><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee to day <S%H3117><s%>:

That thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> may be open <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8803><s%> toward this house <S%H1004><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> and day <S%H3117><s%>, even toward the place <S%H4725><s%> of which thou hast said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, My name <S%H8034><s%> shall be there: that thou mayest hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto the prayer <S%H8605><s%> which thy servant <S%H5650><s%> shall make <S%H6419><s%> <S%H8691><s%> toward this place <S%H4725><s%>.

And hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thou to the supplication <S%H8467><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, and of thy people <S%H5971><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, when they shall pray <S%H6419><s%> <S%H8691><s%> toward this place <S%H4725><s%>: and hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%> thy dwelling <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>: and when thou hearest <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, forgive <S%H5545><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

If any man <S%H376><s%> trespass <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>, and an oath <S%H423><s%> be laid <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon him to cause him to swear <S%H422><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, and the oath <S%H423><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thine altar <S%H4196><s%> in this house <S%H1004><s%>:

Then hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, condemning <S%H7561><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, to bring <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>; and justifying <S%H6663><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him according to his righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

When thy people <S%H5971><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> be smitten down <S%H5062><s%> <S%H8736><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, because they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against thee, and shall turn again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to thee, and confess <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>, and pray <S%H6419><s%> <S%H8694><s%>, and make supplication <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8694><s%> unto thee in this house <S%H1004><s%>:

Then hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and forgive <S%H5545><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the sin <S%H2403><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and bring them again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%> unto the land <S%H127><s%> which thou gavest <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%>.

When heaven <S%H8064><s%> is shut up <S%H6113><s%> <S%H8736><s%>, and there is no rain <S%H4306><s%>, because they have sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against thee; if they pray <S%H6419><s%> <S%H8694><s%> toward this place <S%H4725><s%>, and confess <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>, and turn <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from their sin <S%H2403><s%>, when thou afflictest <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them:

Then hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and forgive <S%H5545><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the sin <S%H2403><s%> of thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, and of thy people <S%H5971><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, that thou teach <S%H3384><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them the good <S%H2896><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> wherein they should walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> upon thy land <S%H776><s%>, which thou hast given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to thy people <S%H5971><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

If there be in the land <S%H776><s%> famine <S%H7458><s%>, if there be pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, blasting <S%H7711><s%>, mildew <S%H3420><s%>, locust <S%H697><s%>, or if there be caterpiller <S%H2625><s%>; if their enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> besiege <S%H6887><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them in the land <S%H776><s%> of their cities <S%H8179><s%>; whatsoever plague <S%H5061><s%>, whatsoever sickness <S%H4245><s%> there be;

What prayer <S%H8605><s%> and supplication <S%H8467><s%> soever be made by any man <S%H120><s%>, or by all thy people <S%H5971><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, which shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> the plague <S%H5061><s%> of his own heart <S%H3824><s%>, and spread forth <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his hands <S%H3709><s%> toward this house <S%H1004><s%>:

Then hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thou in heaven <S%H8064><s%> thy dwelling <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> place <S%H4349><s%>, and forgive <S%H5545><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to every man <S%H376><s%> according to his ways <S%H1870><s%>, whose heart <S%H3824><s%> thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; (for thou, even thou only, knowest <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the hearts <S%H3824><s%> of all the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>;)

That they may fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee all the days <S%H3117><s%> that they live <S%H2416><s%> in <S%H6440><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which thou gavest <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto our fathers <S%H1><s%>.

Moreover concerning a stranger <S%H5237><s%>, that is not of thy people <S%H5971><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, but cometh out <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of a far <S%H7350><s%> country <S%H776><s%> for <S%H4616><s%> thy name's <S%H8034><s%> sake;

(For they shall hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of thy great <S%H1419><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, and of thy strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>, and of thy stretched out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8803><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%>;) when he shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and pray <S%H6419><s%> <S%H8694><s%> toward this house <S%H1004><s%>;
